caller_intent: The caller requested access to their commercial insurance policy's loss history.
resolution_steps: Agent asked whether the policy is personal or commercial.
Caller confirmed it is a commercial policy.
Agent offered to connect the caller with an agent to assist further.
knowledge_required: Understanding how to retrieve loss history for commercial policies
Internal procedures for escalating requests to specialized agents
summary: A commercial policyholder asked for their loss history. The agent confirmed the policy type and offered to escalate the request to a specialist. The call requires follow-up action.
